name: Craft A Day
description:
Train your creation and attention. Craft a day creates a Training Program that challenges your creativity.
Let your kids use their imagination to bring their craft skills to life. Use jigsaw images and arrange them in order to make the correct picture.

The learning is associated with fun, and kids just love to use this game to polish their skills. They would not feel burden, while they learn new concepts.

Get it started and you will be surprised to see how your kid enjoy learning like never before.
Craft A Day is really a great book to learn crafts on your device.
